title: Problem-Solving Learning for Knee Examinations Using Social 360VR

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy and understanding of clinical testing protocols
context.additional_context: Collaborative Learning in Smartphone-Based VR Environments, Including Virtual Simulation Training Before Physical Practice

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce knee ligament examination procedures in a social 360VR environment with over 90% accuracy
Learners apply problem-solving strategies similar to real clinical situations at least three times through virtual case analysis
Identify and propose solutions for at least two test error elements through collaboration with peer learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
